name: Punch The Stool John
description:
Controls:

A= Jump

S/X (On controller)= Punch

(If you are in the tutorial or credits screen and you are using a controller, press B to return to the main menu)

Punch the stools, jump over anything that is not a stool, simple as that!! You can rank up combos by punching stools without getting hit (the combo counter won't reset if you jump over objects).

Score and the combo counter may tend to not answer to the first input, I'll fix this in following updates.

Cover image provided by my dear brother Kukiol, make sure to check his work on Twitter! https://twitter.com/Kukiolworks

Music and Sound effects were made by the wild beepboop master Brent Richard!! For more sweet tunes follow him on Twitter and check his Bandcamp too!! https://twitter.com/BrentRAudio

https://brentrichard.bandcamp.com/

And last but not least, this game couldn't have been possible without the help of the one and only master of the BUT!, Thomas "Straight Lines" McCloskey!! He makes stuff too and he's a BIIIIG fan of metroidvanias, so make sure you remind him how much he loves them by checking his stuff https://gypopothomas.itch.io/
